title: Zen Chronoscope Watch Face
developerAddress: Room 1303, Shilong Road 569, Xuhui DIstrict, Shanghai
description: How to Use?- First, you need to have an Android Wear watch, and download "Android Wear" application from Google Play, then follow instructions to pair them.- After installed on your Android Device, this watchface will be automatically synchronized to your paired Android Wear watch. - Long tap on your Android Wear watch, select "ZenChronoscope_Watchface"
descriptionHTML:
How to Use?
- First, you need to have an Android Wear watch, and download "Android Wear" application from Google Play, then follow instructions to pair them.
- After installed on your Android Device, this watchface will be automatically synchronized to your paired Android Wear watch.
- Long tap on your Android Wear watch, select "ZenChronoscope_Watchface"
comments: Gorgeous I'd love a dark version of this with gold hands and notches
